h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: After defeating this abomination, you can find a **Meditation Spot** by a small tree at the base of the frozen falls, earning you a free Spark Skill Point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating this abomination, you can find a **Meditation Spot** by a small tree at the base of the frozen falls, earning you a free Spark Skill Point.
